text: 65|3|Melum, avarkal etirparkkata vakaiyil avarkalukku ventiya vacatikalai alippan. Evarkal allahvai murrilum nampukirarkalo, avarkalukku avane (murrilum) potumanavan. Niccayamaka allah tan kariyattaic ceyte mutippan. Ayinum, allah ovvonrirkum (oru kalattaiyum) alavaiyum erpatuttivittan. (Atanpatiye nataiperum)
